name: Magic Forest
description: Magic Forest is a classic platformer in which you learn a little history of the travels of the rabbit
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, 7, Vista, 8, 8.1, 10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad Q6700 Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650ti or comparable DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP, 7, Vista, 8, 8.1, 10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad Q6700 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650ti or comparable DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound
